build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: cp .env.railway .env && mkdir -p /app/database && touch /app/database/database.sqlite && chmod 777 /app/database/database.sqlite && chmod 777 /app/database && php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && php artisan storage:link && php artisan migrate:fresh --force --seed && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
